title: Initialize Vue Teamwork Dashboard - API Layer
description:
Create the foundation for a Vue.js dashboard that integrates with Teamwork.

Deliverables:
- Initialize Vite + Vue 3 + TypeScript project in apps/teamwork_dashboard
- Set up Teamwork MCP integration with composables
- Create API composables for task fetching (useTeamworkTasks, useTeamworkProjects)
- Implement type definitions for Teamwork entities (Task, Project, Status, Tag, Comment, TimeLog)
- Add environment configuration for API endpoints
- Set up Tailwind CSS for styling
- Configure routing (Vue Router)
- Basic app shell with navigation

Technical Requirements:
- Use TypeScript strict mode
- Follow Vue 3 Composition API patterns
- Implement proper error handling
- Add loading states for all API calls

title: Build Task List View Component
description:
Create the main task list display component with basic filtering.

Requirements:
- Data table showing: ID, Title, Status, Priority, Tags, Due Date, Assignees
- Search filter by title (debounced input)
- Status filter (multi-select dropdown with all available statuses)
- Priority filter (dropdown: low/medium/high)
- Project filter (multi-select dropdown)
- Loading state with skeleton loaders
- Error handling with retry button
- Responsive design (mobile + desktop)
- Sort by column headers (click to sort)
- Pagination (25/50/100 per page)

Technical Details:
- Use the useTeamworkTasks composable from Task 1
- Implement client-side filtering and sorting
- Store filter state in URL query params (shareable links)
- Add keyboard navigation (arrow keys for row selection)

title: Create Task Detail Sidebar Component
description:
Build a side panel that displays detailed task information.

Requirements:
- Slide-in panel from right side (smooth animation)
- Display full task description with Markdown rendering
- Show all metadata:
  - Assignees (with avatars)
  - Due date and start date
  - Priority (with colored badge)
  - Status (with colored badge)
  - Tags (clickable for filtering)
  - Progress percentage
  - Estimated time vs actual time
- List comments section (read-only for now, functionality in Task 5)
- Display task history/activity timeline
- Show related tasks (predecessors/successors)
- Edit button (non-functional placeholder)
- Close button (X icon)

Technical Details:
- Use Teleport for modal overlay
- Implement focus trap for accessibility
- Escape key to close
- Click outside to close (optional)
- Deep link support (/tasks/:taskId)
